title: Preventing cardiovascular disease needs better risk prediction
summary: Corsera COO explains why the biotech is building an AI-powered risk assessment tool alongside RNAi therapies targeting CVD. Earlier this month, US biotech Corsera Health announced an $80 million Series A raise, fueling its ambitious two-pronged strategy to push cardiovascular care towards a preventive model.
